Title: Yamakasi
Writer: Luc Besson (scenario), Philippe Lyon (scenario & dialogue), Julien Seri (scenario & dialogue), Charles Perrière (original idea), Luc Besson (original idea)
Actors: Châu Belle Dinh, Williams Belle, Malik Diouf, Yann Hnautra
Plot: 7 guys from Paris' suburbs like challenges like climbing tall buildings and doing parkour - especially with cops/flics chasing them. When a kid fan urgently needs a heart the Yamakasis try to find a way.
